discussion.title: Global Loss Function Capabilities
discussion.body: I used to be able to define a global loss function (specifically Spearman rank correlation), but now element-wise loss makes that impossible. Is there a workaround for disabling the element wise requirement in Python? Or at least a good approximation for rank correlation?

nodes.body: Sorry I am not sure I follow. Are you okay to use `loss_function`? This let's you write an arbitrary loss.
